00049 //=================================================================================================
00050 //
00051 // KviRegisteredUser
00052 //
00053 
00054 class KVILIB_API KviRegisteredUser : public KviHeapObject
00055 {
00056         friend class KviRegisteredUserDataBase;
00057 public:
00058         enum IgnoreFlags {
00059                 Channel=1,
00060                 Query=2,
00061                 Notice=4,
00062                 Ctcp=8,
00063                 Invite=16,
00064                 Dcc=32
00065         };
00066 
00067         KviRegisteredUser(const QString &name);
00068         ~KviRegisteredUser();
00069 private:
00070         int                        m_iIgnoreFlags;
00071         bool                       m_bIgnoreEnabled;
00072         QString                    m_szName;
00073         QString                                    m_szGroup;
00074         KviPointerHashTable<QString,QString>           * m_pPropertyDict;   // owned properties
00075         KviPointerList<KviIrcMask>     * m_pMaskList;       // owned masks
00076 protected:
00077         // mask ownership is transferred! (always!) returns false if the mask was already there
00078         bool addMask(KviIrcMask * mask);
00079         bool removeMask(KviIrcMask * mask);
00080         KviIrcMask * findMask(const KviIrcMask &mask);
00081 public:
00082         int  ignoreFlags()                  { return m_iIgnoreFlags; };
00083         void setIgnoreFlags(int flags)      {m_iIgnoreFlags=flags; };
00084         bool ignoreEnagled()                { return m_bIgnoreEnabled; };
00085         void setIgnoreEnabled(bool enabled) {m_bIgnoreEnabled=enabled;};
00086         bool isIgnoreEnabledFor(IgnoreFlags flag);
00087 
00088         const QString &name(){ return m_szName; };
00089         bool matches(const KviIrcMask &mask);
00090         bool matchesFixed(const KviIrcMask &mask);
00091         bool matchesFixed(const QString &nick,const QString &user,const QString &host);
00092 
00093         void setProperty(const QString &name,const QString &value);
00094         void setProperty(const QString &name,bool value);
00095 
00096         void setGroup(const QString &name) { m_szGroup=name; };
00097         const QString &group(){ return m_szGroup; };
00098 
00099         const QString & getProperty(const QString &name);       // returns 0 if the property is not there
00100         bool getProperty(const QString &name,QString &value); // returns false if the property is not there
00101         bool getBoolProperty(const QString &name,bool def=FALSE);           // returns true if the property is there and is true
00102         // the propertyDict may be 0!
00103         KviPointerHashTable<QString,QString> * propertyDict(){ return m_pPropertyDict; };
00104         // this is never zero (but may contain no masks)
00105         KviPointerList<KviIrcMask> * maskList(){ return m_pMaskList; };
00106 };

00130 class KVILIB_API KviRegisteredMask
00131 {
00132 private:
00133         KviRegisteredUser * m_pUser;               // pointer , not owned!
00134         KviIrcMask        * m_pMask;               // pointer , not owned!
00135         int                 m_iMaskNonWildChars;
00136 public:
00137         KviRegisteredMask(KviRegisteredUser * u,KviIrcMask * m);
00138         ~KviRegisteredMask(){};
00139 public:
00140         int                 nonWildChars(){ return m_iMaskNonWildChars; };
00141         KviRegisteredUser * user(){ return m_pUser; };
00142         KviIrcMask        * mask(){ return m_pMask; };
00143 };

00147 //=================================================================================================
00148 //
00149 // KviRegisteredUsersDb
00150 //
00151 //    Manages a set of KviRegisteredUser instances stored in the m_pUserDict dictionary
00152 //    The users are identified by masks stored in m_pMaskDict and m_pWildMaskList
00153 //    m_pMaskDict contains lists of non wild-nick KviRegisteredMask that point to users
00154 //    m_pWildMaskList is a list of wild-nick KviRegisteredMask that point to users
00155 //
00156 
00157 class KVILIB_API KviRegisteredUserDataBase : public QObject
00158 {
00159         Q_OBJECT
00160 public:
00161         KviRegisteredUserDataBase();
00162         ~KviRegisteredUserDataBase();
00163 private:
00164         KviPointerHashTable<QString,KviRegisteredUser>     * m_pUserDict; // unique namespace, owns the objects, does not copy keys
00165         KviPointerHashTable<QString,KviRegisteredMaskList> * m_pMaskDict; // owns the objects, copies the keys
00166         KviRegisteredMaskList          * m_pWildMaskList; // owns the objects
00167         KviPointerHashTable<QString,KviRegisteredUserGroup>* m_pGroupDict;
00168 public:
00169         void copyFrom(KviRegisteredUserDataBase * db);
00170         KviRegisteredUser * addUser(const QString &name); // returns 0 if already there
00171         KviRegisteredUser * getUser(const QString &name); // returns existing or adds
00172         bool removeUser(const QString &name);
00173         bool removeGroup(const QString &name);
00174         KviRegisteredUser * findUserByName(const QString &name){ return m_pUserDict->find(name); };
00175         // mask must be allocated on the heap and the ownership is transferred!
00176         // returns non zero if there is already an user with this mask (returns the pointer to it!)
00177         KviRegisteredUser * addMask(KviRegisteredUser * u,KviIrcMask * mask);
00178         bool removeMaskByPointer(KviIrcMask * mask);
00179         bool removeMask(const KviIrcMask &mask);
00180         KviRegisteredUser * findMatchingUser(const QString &nick,const QString &user,const QString &host);
00181         KviRegisteredUser * findUserWithMask(const KviIrcMask &mask);
00182         KviRegisteredMask * findExactMask(const KviIrcMask &mask);
00183         KviRegisteredMask * findMatchingMask(const QString &nick,const QString &user,const QString &host);
00184         //Only used in few places (actually one) of the code, but lot of times;perfect for inlining...
00185         //bool isIgnoredUser(const char * nick,const char * user,const char * host);
00186         void load(const QString &filename);
00187         void save(const QString &filename);
00188 
00189         KviPointerHashTable<QString,KviRegisteredUser> * userDict(){ return m_pUserDict; };
00190         KviPointerHashTable<QString,KviRegisteredUserGroup>* groupDict() { return m_pGroupDict; };
00191 
00192         KviRegisteredUserGroup* addGroup(const QString &name);
00193 signals:
00194         void userRemoved(const QString&);
00195         void userChanged(const QString&);
00196         void userAdded  (const QString&);
00197         void databaseCleared();
00198 };
